(Unschooling you tube video)
Judy Arnall, Peaceful Parenting Expert, Speaker and Author of "Discipline Without Distress: 135 tools for raising caring, responsible children without time-out, spanking, punishment or bribery" www.professionalparenting.ca Tele: (403) 714-6766 Email jarnall@... "Peace In The World Begins In The Home"

messages.subject: Good News Network
messages.msgSnippet: Video of the Week: A TV Show With Good News Good News was featured exclusively in a recent episode of a TV show that aired in 14 markets last weekend. The
messages.messageBody:
Video of the Week: A TV Show With Good News

Good News was featured exclusively in a recent episode of a TV show
that aired in 14 markets last weekend. The show, produced by Sinclair
Broadcasting, is called American Crossroads.

The entire 60 minutes was a mix of GOOD news, beginning with a nice
long profile of Geri and her Good News Network!

Watch the excellent show on this link!

Â http://www.americancrossroads.tv/players/episodes/vid_66.shtml


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
